venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
We want to give enough time so that you can reserve the next meetup date. We have 1 exciting topic and are currently waiting to hear back for the 2nd. We hope you can join us! We'll be on the first floor of Microsoft NERD once again. Hope to see you there!

ToolBox: "SEO & Wordpress: The Best of Both Worlds" by Casie Gillette, SEO manager at Grasshopper. Here you can learn what SEO is and the fundamentals behind optimizing your website for search engines and the basics on how easy it is to make your WordPress site SEO friendly with various plugins.

Dev/Design: "HTML5 & SEO in WordPress Development" by Brian Whalley and Andy Pitre from HubSpot. Here Brian and Andy will go over HTML5, CSS3 and its implications on SEO in WordPress.

Agenda:
7-7:30pm - Networking, Pizza
7:30-7:45pm - Opening remarks, updates, any other business
7:50-8:50pm - Sessions (rooms TBD)
8:50-9pm - Wrap-up
item.name: *Updated* BWPM June 2010: SEO & WordPress (ToolBox) and (Dev/Design)
